mapper.insert: insert into tbl_comment (comment_content, member_id, post_id) values (#{commentContent}, #{memberId}, #{postId})
mapper.select: select u.user_name ,m.member_profile_url, c.post_id, c.comment_content, c.created_datetime, c.updated_datetime, c.member_id, ujc.job_category, jc.job_name from tbl_user u join tbl_member m on u.id = m.user_id join tbl_post p on m.user_id = p.member_id join tbl_comment c on p.id = c.post_id join tbl_user_job_category ujc on u.id = ujc.user_id join tbl_job_category jc on ujc.job_category = jc.id where c.comment_status = 'active' and c.post_id = #{postId} order by c.created_datetime desc
